thread.title: Teachers' 'Tutam' chant for Ruto means he deserves support in education reforms - Sossion | KenyaMOJA.com
thread.title_full: Teachers' 'Tutam' chant for Ruto means he deserves support in education reforms - Sossion | KenyaMOJA.com

author: TV
title: Teachers' 'Tutam' chant for Ruto means he deserves support in education reforms - Sossion | KenyaMOJA.com
text: - 8 views"If teachers chanted 'Tutam' for President Ruto at State House, it is within their political right. They are bonding and building chemistry with the President and unanimously agreeing that he is doing the right things in education. Pronouncing 'Tutam' means he deserves it." - Wilson Sossion, Former SG, KNUT #MorningCafeTV47 Thank you for watching this video.
